Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of health and mental hygiene to track and report deaths of homeless persons in the city of New York.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOHMH to track and report deaths of homeless persons in NYC.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring employers in the grocery industry to make prevailing health care expenditures on behalf of their employees.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Assessing a fee in certain service industries in order to establish a city program to provide health care for workers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of health and mental hygiene to track and report deaths of homeless persons in the city of New York.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: DOHMH to track and report deaths of homeless persons in NYC.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of health and mental hygiene to track and report deaths of homeless persons in the city of New York.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOHMH to track and report deaths of homeless persons in NYC.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of health and mental hygiene to track and report deaths of homeless persons in the city of New York.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: DOHMH to track and report deaths of homeless persons in NYC.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring employers in the grocery industry to make prevailing health care expenditures on behalf of their employees.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Assessing a fee in certain service industries in order to establish a city program to provide health care for workers.
